verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? Shall we continue <S%G1961><s%> in sin <S%G266><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> may abound <S%G4121><s%>?
God forbid <S%G1096><s%>. How <S%G4459><s%> shall we <S%G2198><s%>, that <S%G3748><s%> are dead <S%G599><s%> to sin <S%G266><s%>, live <S%G2198><s%> any longer <S%G2089><s%> in it <S%G846><s%>?

Know you not <S%G50><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> so many of us as <S%G3745><s%> were baptized <S%G907><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> were baptized <S%G907><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>?

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> we are buried with <S%G4916><s%> him <S%G846><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> baptism <S%G908><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>: that <S%G2443><s%> just as <S%G5618><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> was raised up <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%>, even so <S%G3779><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> should walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> newness <S%G2538><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> we have been <S%G1096><s%> planted together <S%G4854><s%> in the likeness <S%G3667><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, we shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G99999><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in the likeness of his resurrection <S%G386><s%>:

Knowing <S%G1097><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is crucified with <S%G4957><s%> him <S%G2443><s%>, that the body <S%G4983><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> might be destroyed <S%G2673><s%>, that <S%G3588><s%> henceforth <S%G3371><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> should <S%G1398><s%> not <S%G3371><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> he that is dead <S%G599><s%> is freed <S%G1344><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> we are dead <S%G599><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, we believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we shall <S%G4800><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> live with <S%G4800><s%> him <S%G846><s%>:

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> being raised <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> dies <S%G599><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%>; death <S%G2288><s%> has <S%G2961><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> dominion <S%G2961><s%> over him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> in that <S%G3739><s%> he died <S%G599><s%>, he died <S%G599><s%> unto sin <S%G266><s%> once <S%G2178><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> in that <S%G3739><s%> he lives <S%G2198><s%>, he lives <S%G2198><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>.

Likewise <S%G3779><s%> consider <S%G3049><s%> <S%G99999><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> unto sin <S%G266><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Let <S%G936><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> reign <S%G936><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> mortal <S%G2349><s%> body <S%G4983><s%>, that you should <S%G1519><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> it <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the lusts <S%G1939><s%> there <S%G846><s%>.

Neither <S%G3366><s%> yield <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> as instruments <S%G3696><s%> of unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> unto sin <S%G266><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> yield <S%G3936><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> those that are alive <S%G2198><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> as instruments <S%G3696><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> shall <S%G2961><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> have dominion over <S%G2961><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? Shall we sin <S%G264><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>? God <S%G3361><s%> forbid <S%G1096><s%>.

Don <S%G3756><s%>'t you know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> you yield <S%G3936><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> obey <S%G5218><s%>, his servants <S%G1401><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%>? <S%G3739><s%> <S%G99999><s%> Whether <S%G2273><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> of obedience <S%G5218><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> be thanked <S%G5485><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> you were <S%G2258><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> you have obeyed <S%G5219><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> <S%G99999><s%> that form <S%G5179><s%> of teaching <S%G1322><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was delivered you <S%G3860><s%>.
Being <S%G1659><s%> then <S%G1161><s%> made free <S%G1659><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, you became the servants <S%G1402><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

I speak <S%G3004><s%> after the manner of men <S%G442><s%> because of <S%G1223><s%> the infirmity <S%G769><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> you have yielded <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to uncleanness <S%G167><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to iniquity <S%G458><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> iniquity <S%G458><s%>; even so <S%G3779><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> yield <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to righteousness <S%G1343><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> holiness <S%G38><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> you were <S%G2258><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%>, you were <S%G2258><s%> free <S%G1658><s%> from righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> had you <S%G2192><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> those things of which <S%G3739><s%> you are <S%G1870><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> ashamed <S%G1870><s%>? For <S%G1063><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of those things <S%G1565><s%> is death <S%G2288><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> being made free <S%G1659><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> become servants <S%G1402><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>, you have <S%G2192><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> holiness <S%G38><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the wages <S%G3800><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> is death <S%G2288><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> the gift <S%G5486><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>.
